topics.body:
I wish my mom would stop expecting too much from me.

All I did was say "what?" because I didn't hear what a man was saying and my mom scolded me for not saying "Pardon me?" or "Excuse me?".

*I HAD NEVER SAID THOSE WORDS IN MY ENTIRE LIFE.*

I may sound rude but I don't mean to be rude. It's just how I am.

topics.body:
I read an article on Yahoo Answers how Hell wouldn't be so bad anymore since human beings would have adapted due to staying there for who knows how long, probably industrialised it with buildings made of hellstone, unlimited fuel from hellfire, special prisons for the truly bad and maybe even electricity. Due to already being dead, feeling thirsty or hungry just doesn't have much of an effect anymore so food becomes unnecessary. Though you might be on fire all the time, you'll just get used to it until even losing limbs and swimming in lava doesn't bother you.

It was awesome
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
